titleStmt.title: On Thursday the 26. of this instant November, 1685. at the Auction-House in Ave-Mary-lane over against the Black Swan; will be exposed to sale to booksellers part of the stock of Mr. Richard Davis, bookseller of Oxford, by way of auction, containing these following books, viz.
titleStmt.author: Davis, Richard, fl. 1646-1688.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Davis by Wing.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
